      • encryptAndDecryptProcess

        public long[][] encryptAndDecryptProcess​(int messageLength,
                                         int keySize,
                                         int processLoops)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculates time cost for encrypting and decrypting messages by RSA algorithm. Messages are created randomly with the fixed length for each loop. Key pairs are identical for each loop. Careful: the method is synchronized by the object
        参数:
        messageLength - the length for random plain message.
        keySize - the generating size for random key pair.
        processLoops - number of loops for encrypting and decrypting message.
        返回:
        an long array, where array[0] is the average time for encrypting, array[1] is average time for decrypting.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • averageEncryptAndDecryptProcess

        public long[] averageEncryptAndDecryptProcess​(int messageLength,
                                              int keySize,
                                              int processLoops)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculate the average time for encrypting and decrypting processes by RSA algorithm.
        参数:
        messageLength -
        keySize -
        processLoops -
        返回:
        An array, where array[0] is the average time for Encrypting and array[1] is the average time for Decrypting
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • encryptAndDecryptProcess

        public long[][] encryptAndDecryptProcess​(java.lang.String[] messages,
                                         MyAlgorithmParameterSpec[] nSpec,
                                         int[] processLoops)
                                  throws EncryptProcessFailedException,
                                         DecryptProcessFailedException,
                                         GenerateKeyFailedException,
                                         AssessmentTimeOverflowException,
                                         java.security.spec.InvalidParameterSpecException
        Calculates time cost for encrypting and decrypting messages by RSA algorithm. Key pairs are generated by parameterSpec object. Careful: the method is synchronized by the object
        参数:
        messages - String array which contains the messages to be delivered.
        nSpec - parameter array which contains the parameter for each message.
        processLoops - integer array which contains how many loops for each message.
        返回:
        An long[2][length] array, where 2 indicates encrypting time and decrypting time respectively, length indicates how many messages are encrypted/decrypted.
        抛出:
        EncryptProcessFailedException
        DecryptProcessFailedException
        GenerateKeyFailedException
        AssessmentTimeOverflowException - Indicates the assessment process takes too many time(in the case, 500000 milliseconds) for calculating
        java.security.spec.InvalidParameterSpecException
